description: This arrogant Titan staff officer is one of Bask Om`s top henchmen. Assigned to pursue the AEUG flagship Argama after the rebels stage their daring raid on the Titan headquarters, Jamaican takes command of the cruiser Alexandria and chases the Argama back and forth across the Earth Sphere. While he`s an adequate strategist, Jamaican`s smug, condescending attitude quickly alienates the soldiers under his command.
name: Jamaican Daningan
